Title: Year of Enlightment
Writer: Rafael Azcona, Manuel Huete (story), Fernando Trueba
Actors: Jorge Sanz, Maribel Verdú, Verónica Forqué, Manuel Alexandre
Plot: April, 1940. Manolo, 16 years old, and Jesus, who is just 8, are taken by their older brother Pepe, a lieutenant in the Army, to a sanatorium for children suffering from tuberculosis, ...
